title.narrative: QUALITY AND RELEVANT EDUCATION (RKLA 4)

description.narrative: By end of 2015, the Ministry of Education and municipalities ensure that the national education system is inclusive (regardless of ethnicity, ability, and socio-economic background) and effective, in line with CFS st andards, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By end of 2015, as a result of social sector reforms, the Government add resses targeted disparities in the quality of and access to basic social services for vulnerable children and families

sector.narrative: Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Provision of (formal and non-formal) multiple-levels or alternative pathways of education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end of 2015, the Ministry of Education and municipalities ensure that the national education system is inclusive (regardless ofethnicity, ability, and socio-economic background) and effective, in line with CFS st andards
% of teachers that are applying new teaching and learning methods in line with CFS standards, including inclusive education

baseline.value: 35% of math teachers, and 47% of literacy teachers in grades 1-3 have pedagogical knowledge related to the approaches promoted by the project

title.narrative: A revised normative framework and a funding formula for allocating resources per student are applied

baseline.value: No sub-laws and standards to regulate provision of inclusive education
